channel.title: SPIEGEL ONLINE - International
channel.description: Daily news, analysis and opinion from Europe's leading newsmagazine and Germany's top news Web site.

item.title: The Battle for Europe's Top Job: It's Wrong to Horse Trade Over Next Commission President
item.description: French President Emmanuel Macron is ignoring the results of the European election by trying to make a back-room deal with other EU leaders over who should become the next president of the European Commission. It's a serious mistake.
item.content:encoded: French President Emmanuel Macron is ignoring the results of the European election by trying to make a back-room deal with other EU leaders over who should become the next president of the European Commission. It's a serious mistake.
